text: So I choose to speak about batteries, because it was and it is still an object that we keep improving. We always want it to be lighter,smaller and more effecient but we also want it to be the cheaper and more ecologic. The batteries are evolving really fast, especilly in our decade, in the last few years we almost stop using the batteries that can not be refilled. Now we all use electrical ones, and this improvement totally changed the technology field. We just need to compare the computer seld in the early twenty-one century and now, the biggest difference are the weight and the volume, this is due to the size of the battery inside. Behind this there are many scientist who work on improving the efficiency and the lithium ions are the most practical solution that they find for the moment, it is use in our phone for exemple. However the battery still have a long way to go because of the effects that it might have on the environment. The last reaserches are base on the dioxygène because it does not polute however it is quit dangerous because it can explose. But we keep finding ways to secure it. So it is a field constantly moving to a solution to an other and this is why I am curious what will be the next revolutionary battery that we will create and to what extent it will change our lives.
